package.name: Interakt_App
package.summary: The only integration you need for Lead Capture, Customer Engagement & Retention.
package.description:
Capture, Engage & Retain everyone on your site. Interakt is the only integration you need for Lead Capture, Customer Engagement & Retention.

Interakt simplifies customer data analysis, marketing and support. It is an integrated CRM that lets you do email marketing, engage customers through live chat, retain and support your customers, all from one single dashboard.

With Interakt you can capture new leads directly from your Magento application, connect with existing customers via email and push notifications and answer their queries through live chat and helpdesk.

360° LEAD CAPTURE
Capture Leads in every possible way. Import existing leads, divide them in segments and nurture them in realtime.

CONSOLIDATE USER DATA
Capture user sessions, activities & dynamics with rich profiling for every user. Create segments and track their progress.

POWERFUL EMAIL AUTOMATION
Customize templates and send automated marketing & transactional emails. Engage users and view comprehensive email stats.

ENGAGE WITH LIVE CHAT
Engage visitors & provide live support to exisiting users. Use a customizable chat window or the offline mode.

COLLECT FEEDBACK & SUPPORT WITH HELPDESK
Route customer queries to our simplified helpdesk and collect valuable feedback through our smart feedback widget.


How to Install & Integrate Interakt Extension in Magento

  1. Click the Install Now button on the page
  2. Copy the Key provided
  3. Login to your Magento connect manager, paste key and click to install
  4. Click the Systems Tab to populate the drop down menu & select configuration
  5. Click on the InteraktApp tab, paste App Key and App ID which you can get from your Interakt.co account.
  6. Click on Save Config button to save the configuration changes
  7. Click on Sync User button to sync your existing customer data with Interakt
package.notes: For any queries, please contact support@interakt.co
